title: Lich (monster class)/ko
data:
[![Wikipedia](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "Wikipedia")

[Wikipedia](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page "wikipedia:Main Page") has an article about:

***[Lich](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lich "wikipedia:Lich")***

**리치**는 ([이끼](/wiki/Lichen "Lichen")와 혼동하지 마십시오) a [class](/wiki/Monster_class "Monster class") of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") in [NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack") represented by the overall symbol L. 리치는 모두 강력한 주문 시전자들이며, 그들의 더 강력한 모습들은 [방어구](/wiki/Armor "Armor") 파괴, [죽음의 손길](/wiki/Touch_of_death/ko "Touch of death/ko")과 많은 다른 주문들 시전, 그리고 공격받았을때 [순간이동](/wiki/Teleport "Teleport")으로 가버리기의 능력을 가지고 있습니다; 그러므로 그들은 자주 [축복받은](/wiki/Blessed "Blessed") [학살](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")의 대상이 됩니다. 모든 리치는 죽었을때 허물어지기 때문에 그러므로 시체를 남기지 않습니다. 가장 강력한 두 종류는 일반적으로는 생성되지 않는 유용한 [새기기용](/wiki/Engraving "Engraving") 무기인, [의식용 칼](/wiki/Athame "Athame")과 [함께 생성될수 있습니다](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory").

[ ]

## 어원

리치는 여러 게르만어에서 "시체"를 뜻하며, and survives in English in the word "lichgate" (or "lych-gate", etc.), a covered entranceway to a churchyard. Nothing to do with "leech".

## 설명

Liches are powerful spellcasters, often magicians or kings, who seek to defy death by magical means. Are depicted as being clearly cadaverous, bodies desiccated or completely skeletal, with glowing lights in place of their eyes.

| A lich:* [does not breathe](/wiki/Breathless "Breathless").
* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* [regenerates HP quickly](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration").
* is [poisonous](/wiki/Poisonous "Poisonous") to eat.
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is [undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                                                                                            |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [monst.c#line1514](/wiki/Monst.c#line1514 "Monst.c")                                       |

The **lich**, L, is the least powerful monster of this class. It is slower than its brethren and not a significant threat. At the experience levels it is normally encountered, its complement of spells include [healing](/wiki/Healing "Healing") itself, [hasting](/wiki/Speed "Speed") itself, [stunning](/wiki/Stun "Stun") you, turning [invisible](/wiki/Invisibility "Invisibility"), draining your [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength"), [destroying your armor](/wiki/Destroy_armor_\(monster_spell\) "Destroy armor (monster spell)"), [cursing](/wiki/Curse_items "Curse items") your items and [aggravating monsters](/wiki/Aggravate_monster "Aggravate monster") (awakening monsters on the level and drawing them to you). It is possible for a lich to be generated with a high enough level (16) to cast [summon nasties](/wiki/Summon_nasties "Summon nasties"); however, this will not happen in the Castle unless you reach it at a much higher experience level than normal.

In addition to the spells the normal lich can cast, the **demilich**, L, can often cast [summon nasties](/wiki/Summon_nasties "Summon nasties"); 만약 당신이 성채에서 하나를 만난다면, 이 주문을 시전할 수 있다는 것은 확실합니다. [죽음의 손길](/wiki/Touch_of_death/ko "Touch of death/ko")을 시전하기 위해 충분히 높은 레벨 (21)에서 데미 리치가 생성되는것이 가능합니다; 하지만, 이것은 게헨놈에 도달하기 전까지는 거의 불가능 합니다.

* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").

* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* wants the [Book of the Dead](/wiki/Book_of_the_Dead "Book of the Dead").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").

| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [monst.c#line1527](/wiki/Monst.c#line1527 "Monst.c") |

마스터 리치와 아크 리치는 (보통 "보라색 L"로 불립니다.) 플레이어에게 순간이동할수 있으며, then to the upstairs to heal and back again, like a demon lord/prince. This form of teleportation is unaffected by no-teleport levels. While master liches at their base level cannot cast touch of death, if your experience level and/or dungeon level is high enough, they will be generated with the ability to cast that spell. Master liches [are generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a 7% chance of either an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame") (86% chance) or a [wand of nothing](/wiki/Wand_of_nothing "Wand of nothing"), but no random [offensive items](/wiki/Offensive_item "Offensive item").

* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless"). |                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                           |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [monst.c#line1536](/wiki/Monst.c#line1536 "Monst.c")                                      |

**아크 리치**는, L, 리치 중에 가장 강력한 모습입니다. In fact, it has the highest [difficulty](/wiki/Difficulty "Difficulty") of all randomly generated monsters. Next to the [Wizard of Yendor](/wiki/Wizard_of_Yendor "Wizard of Yendor"), it is one of the most powerful spell-casting monsters in the game. In addition to the spells its weaker brethren can cast, it is guaranteed to be able to cast [touch of death](/wiki/Touch_of_death "Touch of death"), bringing [instadeath](/wiki/Instadeath "Instadeath") to the unprepared.

Arch-liches have a 33% chance of [getting](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") either an [athame](/wiki/Athame "Athame") (66%) or a non-negatively enchanted [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"). 여기에는 아주 작은 확률로 (1/260) 의식용 칼이 [Magicbane](/wiki/Magicbane "Magicbane") 일수 있습니다.

If you [teleport](/wiki/Teleportation "Teleportation"), a pet arch-lich will teleport itself to your new location. They will [pick up](/wiki/Pick_up "Pick up") and wear [armor](/wiki/Armor "Armor"), but not wield [weapons](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon"). You do not need to feed it.

## 전략

|   [2](/wiki/Warning "Warning")[2](/wiki/Warning "Warning")[3](/wiki/Warning "Warning")[i](/wiki/Imp "Imp")[i](/wiki/Lemure "Lemure")[i](/wiki/Lemure "Lemure")   [i](/wiki/Lemure "Lemure") [i](/wiki/Lemure "Lemure")[i](/wiki/Imp "Imp") [1](/wiki/Warning "Warning")[3](/wiki/Warning "Warning")[2](/wiki/Warning "Warning")[2](/wiki/Warning "Warning")  
|        ------------[3](/wiki/Warning "Warning")  
|  [2](/wiki/Warning "Warning")     ..L\@...    |  
\|------------------ |  
|   [)](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon")    [%](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")        | |  
|[^](/wiki/Fire_trap "Fire trap")--------------- |[)](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon")|

An arch-lich in action.

Since liches are covetous (teleporting back and forth from the up stairs), the general [strategy](/wiki/Covetous#Strategy "Covetous") for dealing with covetous monsters applies here. 만약 당신이 [teleport control](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control")가 있다면, you can teleport to the up stairs before it does. 영구적인 [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth")를 on the up stairs에 새기는 것은 그들을 후퇴로부터 막을수 있습니다. (A non permanent engraving will always erode.)

리치는 [마비의 물약](/wiki/Potion_of_paralysis "Potion of paralysis")을 휘두르는 것으로 텔레포트를 방지할수 있습니다, [자유 행동의 반지](/wiki/Ring_of_free_action "Ring of free action")를 장착한 상태에서 그것으로 그들을 때리면 됩니다. 이것은 그들이 마비된 동안 그것들을 처분할 수 있는 충분한 시간이 제공될 것입니다.

리치를 상대하는 가장 좋은 방법은 리치가 당신의 인벤토리에 저주를 거는것을 막아주는 Magicbane을 장착하는 것입니다. Another way is to use [Elbereth](/wiki/Elbereth "Elbereth") to prevent the lich from touching you. The Elbereth strategy will still leave you potentially open to attacks from the nasties that the liches summon.

3개의 낮은 리치 종류는 전격 피해를 저항하지 않기 때문에, [묠니르](/wiki/Mjollnir "Mjollnir")는 이들을 상대하기 위한 최고의 무기입니다. 만약 묠니르가 없다면, the [Fire Brand](/wiki/Fire_Brand "Fire Brand") will work on them as well. 아크 리치는 대부분의 원소를 저항해서, [코카트리스](/wiki/Cockatrice "Cockatrice") 또는 치카트리스 시체로 그들을 타격하는 방법을 제외하면 그들을 쓰러트릴 빠른 방법은 없습니다. (장갑 장착을 잊지 마십시오), 그것은 그들을 즉시 돌로 만들 것입니다. 모든 리치는 [검정 용](/wiki/Black_dragon "Black dragon") [숨결](/wiki/Breath "Breath")에 의해 [분해당하거나](/wiki/Disintegration "Disintegration") 또는 [보라 벌레](/wiki/Purple_worm "Purple worm")에 의해 [삼켜질수](/wiki/Digestion "Digestion") 있습니다.

모든 리치 종류는 [언데드](/wiki/Undead "Undead")이며 [혼돈](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") 성향으로 간주되므로, 만약 당신이 혼돈 성향이라면, 축복받은 [죽음의 책](/wiki/Book_of_the_Dead "Book of the Dead")을 읽음으로써 그들을 길들일수 있습니다. 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는, however, are [covetous](/wiki/Covetous "Covetous") monsters that wish to possess the [Book of the Dead](/wiki/Book_of_the_Dead "Book of the Dead"), and therefore can only be made peaceful, not tame. A tamed arch-lich can be made using the [create familiar](/wiki/Spellbook_of_create_familiar "Spellbook of create familiar") spell or by taming its lower brethren and then allowing them to grow up, but it's of little use as a tamed arch-lich can only cast self-beneficial spells, and therefore is rendered as a mediocre attacker that cannot even harm things immune to cold. Despite their covetous nature, 그들은 [옌도르의 부적](/wiki/Amulet_of_Yendor "Amulet of Yendor")을 원하지 않습니다. 그러므로, they cannot be used to transport it across a non-teleport level.

## 펫으로

리치는 허용되는 애완동물을 만들 수 있지만, 그들의 단점이 있습니다. 그것들은 냉기 저항 몬스터에 대해 본질적으로 쓸모없고 내버려둬도 위험합니다. The stronger versions will also always stay next to the player, which is useful if you don't have a [magic whistle](/wiki/Magic_whistle "Magic whistle") but also can be a nuisance by them getting in the way, and makes it difficult to stop them from killing [shopkeepers](/wiki/Shopkeepers "Shopkeepers"). 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는 그들의 [covetous](/wiki/Covetous "Covetous") nature 때문에 길들여질수 없습니다. It is, however, possible to tame a lich or demilich and have it [grow up](/wiki/Growing_up "Growing up"). 당신은 또한 다른 펫에게 폴리모프를 시켜서 이들을 얻을수도 있습니다.

## Encyclopedia entry

But on its heels ere the sunset faded, there came a second apparition, striding with incredible strides and halting when it loomed almost upon me in the red twilight-the monstrous mummy of some ancient king still crowned with untarnished gold but turning to my gaze a visage that more than time or the worm had wasted. Broken swathings flapped about the skeleton legs, and above the crown that was set with sapphires and orange rubies, a black something swayed and nodded horribly; but, for an instant, I did not dream what it was. Then, in its middle, two oblique and scarlet eyes opened and glowed like hellish coals, and two ophidian fangs glittered in an ape-like mouth. A squat, furless, shapeless head on a neck of disproportionate extent leaned unspeakably down and whispered in the mummy's ear. Then, with one stride, the titanic lich took half the distance between us, and from out the folds of the tattered sere-cloth a gaunt arm arose, and fleshless, taloned fingers laden with glowering gems, reached out and fumbled for my throat ...

\[ The Abominations of Yondo, Clark Ashton Smith, 1926 ]

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.0. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d6/Nh360-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.0. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0"). Information on this page may be out of date.

html:
Lich (monster class)/ko

From NetHackWiki
< Lich (monster class)
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Wikipedia has an article about:
Lich

리치는 (이끼와 혼동하지 마십시오) a class of monster in NetHack represented by the overall symbol L. 리치는 모두 강력한 주문 시전자들이며, 그들의 더 강력한 모습들은 방어구 파괴, 죽음의 손길과 많은 다른 주문들 시전, 그리고 공격받았을때 순간이동으로 가버리기의 능력을 가지고 있습니다; 그러므로 그들은 자주 축복받은 학살의 대상이 됩니다. 모든 리치는 죽었을때 허물어지기 때문에 그러므로 시체를 남기지 않습니다. 가장 강력한 두 종류는 일반적으로는 생성되지 않는 유용한 새기기용 무기인, 의식용 칼과 함께 생성될수 있습니다.

Contents

  • 1 어원
  • 2 설명
  • 3 리치
  • 4 데미 리치
  • 5 마스터 리치
  • 6 아크 리치
  • 7 전략
  • 8 펫으로
  • 9 Encyclopedia entry

어원

리치는 여러 게르만어에서 "시체"를 뜻하며, and survives in English in the word "lichgate" (or "lych-gate", etc.), a covered entranceway to a churchyard. Nothing to do with "leech".

설명

Liches are powerful spellcasters, often magicians or kings, who seek to defy death by magical means. Are depicted as being clearly cadaverous, bodies desiccated or completely skeletal, with glowing lights in place of their eyes.

리치

L lich
Difficulty 14
Attacks Touch 1d10 cold, Spell-casting
L lich
Difficulty 14
Attacks

Touch 1d10 cold, Spell-casting

Base level 11
Base experience 269
Speed 6
Base AC 0
Base MR 30
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 100
Size Medium
Resistances 냉기, 수면, 독
Resistances conveyed Cold

A lich:

  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is undead.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • has infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference monst.c#line1514

The lich, L, is the least powerful monster of this class. It is slower than its brethren and not a significant threat. At the experience levels it is normally encountered, its complement of spells include healing itself, hasting itself, stunning you, turning invisible, draining your strength, destroying your armor, cursing your items and aggravating monsters (awakening monsters on the level and drawing them to you). It is possible for a lich to be generated with a high enough level (16) to cast summon nasties; however, this will not happen in the Castle unless you reach it at a much higher experience level than normal.

데미 리치

L demilich
Difficulty 18
Attacks Touch 3d4 cold, Spell-casting
L demilich
Difficulty 18
Attacks

Touch 3d4 cold, Spell-casting

Base level 14
Base experience 378
Speed 9
Base AC -2
Base MR 60
Alignment -12 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 100
Size Medium
Resistances 냉기, 수면, 독
Resistances conveyed Cold

A demilich:

  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is undead.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • has infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference monst.c#line1520

In addition to the spells the normal lich can cast, the demilich, L, can often cast summon nasties; 만약 당신이 성채에서 하나를 만난다면, 이 주문을 시전할 수 있다는 것은 확실합니다. 죽음의 손길을 시전하기 위해 충분히 높은 레벨 (21)에서 데미 리치가 생성되는것이 가능합니다; 하지만, 이것은 게헨놈에 도달하기 전까지는 거의 불가능 합니다.

마스터 리치

L master lich
Difficulty 21
Attacks Touch 3d6 cold, spell-casting
L master lich
Difficulty 21
Attacks

Touch 3d6 cold, spell-casting

Base level 17
Base experience 494
Speed 9
Base AC -4
Base MR 90
Alignment -15 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 100
Size Medium
Resistances 냉기, 수면, 독, 화염
Resistances conveyed Cold

A master lich:

  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is undead.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants the Book of the Dead.
  • has infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference monst.c#line1527

마스터 리치와 아크 리치는 (보통 "보라색 L"로 불립니다.) 플레이어에게 순간이동할수 있으며, then to the upstairs to heal and back again, like a demon lord/prince. This form of teleportation is unaffected by no-teleport levels. While master liches at their base level cannot cast touch of death, if your experience level and/or dungeon level is high enough, they will be generated with the ability to cast that spell. Master liches are generated with a 7% chance of either an athame (86% chance) or a wand of nothing, but no random offensive items.

아크 리치

L arch-lich
Difficulty 29
Attacks Touch 5d6 cold, Spell-casting
L arch-lich
Difficulty 29
Attacks

Touch 5d6 cold, Spell-casting

Base level 25
Base experience 915
Speed 9
Base AC -6
Base MR 90
Alignment -15 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 100
Size Medium
Resistances 화염, 냉기, 수면, 전격, 독
Resistances conveyed Fire, Cold

An arch-lich:

  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is undead.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants the Book of the Dead.
  • has infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.
Reference monst.c#line1536

아크 리치는, L, 리치 중에 가장 강력한 모습입니다. In fact, it has the highest difficulty of all randomly generated monsters. Next to the Wizard of Yendor, it is one of the most powerful spell-casting monsters in the game. In addition to the spells its weaker brethren can cast, it is guaranteed to be able to cast touch of death, bringing instadeath to the unprepared.

Arch-liches have a 33% chance of getting either an athame (66%) or a non-negatively enchanted quarterstaff. 여기에는 아주 작은 확률로 (1/260) 의식용 칼이 Magicbane 일수 있습니다.

If you teleport, a pet arch-lich will teleport itself to your new location. They will pick up and wear armor, but not wield weapons. You do not need to feed it.

전략

|   223iii   i ii 1322
|        ------------3
|  2     ..L@...    |
|------------------ |
|   )    %        | |
|^--------------- |)|

An arch-lich in action.

Since liches are covetous (teleporting back and forth from the up stairs), the general strategy for dealing with covetous monsters applies here. 만약 당신이 teleport control가 있다면, you can teleport to the up stairs before it does. 영구적인 Elbereth를 on the up stairs에 새기는 것은 그들을 후퇴로부터 막을수 있습니다. (A non permanent engraving will always erode.)

리치는 마비의 물약을 휘두르는 것으로 텔레포트를 방지할수 있습니다, 자유 행동의 반지를 장착한 상태에서 그것으로 그들을 때리면 됩니다. 이것은 그들이 마비된 동안 그것들을 처분할 수 있는 충분한 시간이 제공될 것입니다.

리치를 상대하는 가장 좋은 방법은 리치가 당신의 인벤토리에 저주를 거는것을 막아주는 Magicbane을 장착하는 것입니다. Another way is to use Elbereth to prevent the lich from touching you. The Elbereth strategy will still leave you potentially open to attacks from the nasties that the liches summon.

3개의 낮은 리치 종류는 전격 피해를 저항하지 않기 때문에, 묠니르는 이들을 상대하기 위한 최고의 무기입니다. 만약 묠니르가 없다면, the Fire Brand will work on them as well. 아크 리치는 대부분의 원소를 저항해서, 코카트리스 또는 치카트리스 시체로 그들을 타격하는 방법을 제외하면 그들을 쓰러트릴 빠른 방법은 없습니다. (장갑 장착을 잊지 마십시오), 그것은 그들을 즉시 돌로 만들 것입니다. 모든 리치는 검정 용 숨결에 의해 분해당하거나 또는 보라 벌레에 의해 삼켜질수 있습니다.

모든 리치 종류는 언데드이며 혼돈 성향으로 간주되므로, 만약 당신이 혼돈 성향이라면, 축복받은 죽음의 책을 읽음으로써 그들을 길들일수 있습니다. 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는, however, are covetous monsters that wish to possess the Book of the Dead, and therefore can only be made peaceful, not tame. A tamed arch-lich can be made using the create familiar spell or by taming its lower brethren and then allowing them to grow up, but it's of little use as a tamed arch-lich can only cast self-beneficial spells, and therefore is rendered as a mediocre attacker that cannot even harm things immune to cold. Despite their covetous nature, 그들은 옌도르의 부적을 원하지 않습니다. 그러므로, they cannot be used to transport it across a non-teleport level.

펫으로

리치는 허용되는 애완동물을 만들 수 있지만, 그들의 단점이 있습니다. 그것들은 냉기 저항 몬스터에 대해 본질적으로 쓸모없고 내버려둬도 위험합니다. The stronger versions will also always stay next to the player, which is useful if you don't have a magic whistle but also can be a nuisance by them getting in the way, and makes it difficult to stop them from killing shopkeepers. 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는 그들의 covetous nature 때문에 길들여질수 없습니다. It is, however, possible to tame a lich or demilich and have it grow up. 당신은 또한 다른 펫에게 폴리모프를 시켜서 이들을 얻을수도 있습니다.

Encyclopedia entry

But on its heels ere the sunset faded, there came a second apparition, striding with incredible strides and halting when it loomed almost upon me in the red twilight-the monstrous mummy of some ancient king still crowned with untarnished gold but turning to my gaze a visage that more than time or the worm had wasted. Broken swathings flapped about the skeleton legs, and above the crown that was set with sapphires and orange rubies, a black something swayed and nodded horribly; but, for an instant, I did not dream what it was. Then, in its middle, two oblique and scarlet eyes opened and glowed like hellish coals, and two ophidian fangs glittered in an ape-like mouth. A squat, furless, shapeless head on a neck of disproportionate extent leaned unspeakably down and whispered in the mummy's ear. Then, with one stride, the titanic lich took half the distance between us, and from out the folds of the tattered sere-cloth a gaunt arm arose, and fleshless, taloned fingers laden with glowering gems, reached out and fumbled for my throat ...

[ The Abominations of Yondo, Clark Ashton Smith, 1926 ]

rawPage:
{{wikipedia|Lich}} '''리치'''는 ([[lichen|이끼]]와 혼동하지 마십시오) a [[monster class|class]] of [[monster]] in [[NetHack]] represented by the overall symbol {{white|L}}. 리치는 모두 강력한 주문 시전자들이며, 그들의 더 강력한 모습들은 [[armor|방어구]] 파괴, [[touch of death/ko|죽음의 손길]]과 많은 다른 주문들 시전, 그리고 공격받았을때 [[teleport|순간이동]]으로 가버리기의 능력을 가지고 있습니다; 그러므로 그들은 자주 [[blessed|축복받은]] [[genocide|학살]]의 대상이 됩니다. 모든 리치는 죽었을때 허물어지기 때문에 그러므로 시체를 남기지 않습니다. 가장 강력한 두 종류는 일반적으로는 생성되지 않는 유용한 [[engraving|새기기용]] 무기인, [[athame|의식용 칼]]과 [[Monster_starting_inventory|함께 생성될수 있습니다]]. ==어원== 리치는 여러 게르만어에서 "시체"를 뜻하며, and survives in English in the word "lichgate" (or "lych-gate", etc.), a covered entranceway to a churchyard. Nothing to do with "leech". ==설명== Liches are powerful spellcasters, often magicians or kings, who seek to defy death by magical means. Are depicted as being clearly cadaverous, bodies desiccated or completely skeletal, with glowing lights in place of their eyes. {{clear}} ==리치== {{monster |name=lich |difficulty=14 |level=11 |experience=269 |speed=6 |AC=0 |MR=30 |align=-9 |frequency=1 |genocidable=Yes |attacks=Touch 1d10 [[cold]], [[monster spell|Spell-casting]] |weight=1200 |nutr=100 |size=Medium |resistances=냉기, 수면, 독 |resistances conveyed=Cold |attributes={{attributes|A lich| |nocorpse=1|breathless=1|humanoid=1|pois=1|regen=1|= |undead=1|hostile=1|magic=1|infravision=1}} |reference=[[monst.c#line1514]] }} The '''lich''', {{monsym|lich}}, is the least powerful monster of this class. It is slower than its brethren and not a significant threat. At the experience levels it is normally encountered, its complement of spells include [[healing]] itself, [[speed|hasting]] itself, [[stun]]ning you, turning [[invisibility|invisible]], draining your [[strength]], [[Destroy armor (monster spell)|destroying your armor]], [[curse items|cursing]] your items and [[aggravate monster|aggravating monsters]] (awakening monsters on the level and drawing them to you). It is possible for a lich to be generated with a high enough level (16) to cast [[summon nasties]]; however, this will not happen in the Castle unless you reach it at a much higher experience level than normal. {{clear}} ==데미 리치== {{monster |name=demilich |difficulty=18 |level=14 |experience=378 |speed=9 |AC=-2 |MR=60 |align=-12 |frequency=1 |genocidable=Yes |attacks=Touch 3d4 [[cold]], [[monster spell|Spell-casting]] |weight=1200 |nutr=100 |size=Medium |resistances=냉기, 수면, 독 |resistances conveyed=Cold |attributes={{attributes|A demilich| |nocorpse=1|breathless=1|humanoid=1|pois=1|regen=1|= |undead=1|hostile=1|magic=1|infravision=1}} |reference=[[monst.c#line1520]] }} In addition to the spells the normal lich can cast, the '''demilich''', {{monsym|demilich}}, can often cast [[summon nasties]]; 만약 당신이 성채에서 하나를 만난다면, 이 주문을 시전할 수 있다는 것은 확실합니다. [[touch of death/ko|죽음의 손길]]을 시전하기 위해 충분히 높은 레벨 (21)에서 데미 리치가 생성되는것이 가능합니다; 하지만, 이것은 게헨놈에 도달하기 전까지는 거의 불가능 합니다. {{clear}} ==마스터 리치== {{monster |name=master lich |difficulty=21 |level=17 |experience=494 |speed=9 |AC=-4 |MR=90 |align=-15 |frequency=1 |genocidable=Yes |attacks=Touch 3d6 [[cold]], spell-casting |weight=1200 |nutr=100 |size=Medium |resistances=냉기, 수면, 독, 화염 |resistances conveyed=Cold |attributes={{attributes|A master lich| |nocorpse=1|hell=1|breathless=1|humanoid=1|pois=1|= |regen=1|undead=1|hostile=1|magic=1|wantsbook=1|infravision=1}} |reference=[[monst.c#line1527]] }} 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는 (보통 "보라색 L"로 불립니다.) 플레이어에게 순간이동할수 있으며, then to the upstairs to heal and back again, like a demon lord/prince. This form of teleportation is unaffected by no-teleport levels. While master liches at their base level cannot cast touch of death, if your experience level and/or dungeon level is high enough, they will be generated with the ability to cast that spell. Master liches [[Monster_starting_inventory|are generated with]] a 7% chance of either an [[athame]] (86% chance) or a [[wand of nothing]], but no random [[offensive item]]s. {{clear}} ==아크 리치== {{monster |name=arch-lich |difficulty=29 |level=25 |experience=915 |speed=9 |AC=-6 |MR=90 |align=-15 |frequency=1 |genocidable=Yes |attacks=Touch 5d6 [[cold]], [[monster spell|Spell-casting]] |weight=1200 |nutr=100 |size=Medium |resistances=화염, 냉기, 수면, 전격, 독 |resistances conveyed=Fire, Cold |attributes={{attributes|An arch-lich| |nocorpse=1|hell=1|breathless=1|humanoid=1|pois=1|= |regen=1|undead=1|hostile=1|magic=1|wantsbook=1|infravision=1}} |reference=[[monst.c#line1536]] }} '''아크 리치'''는, {{monsym|arch-lich}}, 리치 중에 가장 강력한 모습입니다. In fact, it has the highest [[difficulty]] of all randomly generated monsters. Next to the [[Wizard of Yendor]], it is one of the most powerful spell-casting monsters in the game. In addition to the spells its weaker brethren can cast, it is guaranteed to be able to cast [[touch of death]], bringing [[instadeath]] to the unprepared. Arch-liches have a 33% chance of [[Monster_starting_inventory|getting]] either an [[athame]] (66%) or a non-negatively enchanted [[quarterstaff]]. 여기에는 아주 작은 확률로 (1/260) 의식용 칼이 [[Magicbane]] 일수 있습니다. If you [[teleportation|teleport]], a pet arch-lich will teleport itself to your new location. They will [[pick up]] and wear [[armor]], but not wield [[weapon]]s. You do not need to feed it. {{clear}} ==전략==

An arch-lich in action.
Since liches are covetous (teleporting back and forth from the up stairs), the general [[Covetous#Strategy|strategy]] for dealing with covetous monsters applies here. 만약 당신이 [[teleport control]]가 있다면, you can teleport to the up stairs before it does. 영구적인 [[Elbereth]]를 on the up stairs에 새기는 것은 그들을 후퇴로부터 막을수 있습니다. (A non permanent engraving will always erode.) 리치는 [[potion of paralysis|마비의 물약]]을 휘두르는 것으로 텔레포트를 방지할수 있습니다, [[ring of free action|자유 행동의 반지]]를 장착한 상태에서 그것으로 그들을 때리면 됩니다. 이것은 그들이 마비된 동안 그것들을 처분할 수 있는 충분한 시간이 제공될 것입니다. 리치를 상대하는 가장 좋은 방법은 리치가 당신의 인벤토리에 저주를 거는것을 막아주는 Magicbane을 장착하는 것입니다. Another way is to use [[Elbereth]] to prevent the lich from touching you. The Elbereth strategy will still leave you potentially open to attacks from the nasties that the liches summon. 3개의 낮은 리치 종류는 전격 피해를 저항하지 않기 때문에, [[Mjollnir|묠니르]]는 이들을 상대하기 위한 최고의 무기입니다. 만약 묠니르가 없다면, the [[Fire Brand|Fire Brand]] will work on them as well. 아크 리치는 대부분의 원소를 저항해서, [[cockatrice|코카트리스]] 또는 치카트리스 시체로 그들을 타격하는 방법을 제외하면 그들을 쓰러트릴 빠른 방법은 없습니다. (장갑 장착을 잊지 마십시오), 그것은 그들을 즉시 돌로 만들 것입니다. 모든 리치는 [[black dragon|검정 용]] [[breath|숨결]]에 의해 [[disintegration|분해당하거나]] 또는 [[purple worm|보라 벌레]]에 의해 [[digestion|삼켜질수]] 있습니다. 모든 리치 종류는 [[undead|언데드]]이며 [[chaotic|혼돈]] 성향으로 간주되므로, 만약 당신이 혼돈 성향이라면, 축복받은 [[Book of the Dead|죽음의 책]]을 읽음으로써 그들을 길들일수 있습니다. 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는, however, are [[covetous]] monsters that wish to possess the [[Book of the Dead]], and therefore can only be made peaceful, not tame. A tamed arch-lich can be made using the {{spell of|create familiar}} spell or by taming its lower brethren and then allowing them to grow up, but it's of little use as a tamed arch-lich can only cast self-beneficial spells, and therefore is rendered as a mediocre attacker that cannot even harm things immune to cold. Despite their covetous nature, 그들은 [[Amulet of Yendor|옌도르의 부적]]을 원하지 않습니다. 그러므로, they cannot be used to transport it across a non-teleport level. ==펫으로== 리치는 허용되는 애완동물을 만들 수 있지만, 그들의 단점이 있습니다. 그것들은 냉기 저항 몬스터에 대해 본질적으로 쓸모없고 내버려둬도 위험합니다. The stronger versions will also always stay next to the player, which is useful if you don't have a [[magic whistle]] but also can be a nuisance by them getting in the way, and makes it difficult to stop them from killing [[shopkeepers]]. 마스터 리치와 아크 리치는 그들의 [[covetous]] nature 때문에 길들여질수 없습니다. It is, however, possible to tame a lich or demilich and have it [[Growing_up|grow up]]. 당신은 또한 다른 펫에게 폴리모프를 시켜서 이들을 얻을수도 있습니다. == Encyclopedia entry == {{encyclopedia| But on its heels ere the sunset faded, there came a second apparition, striding with incredible strides and halting when it loomed almost upon me in the red twilight-the monstrous mummy of some ancient king still crowned with untarnished gold but turning to my gaze a visage that more than time or the worm had wasted. Broken swathings flapped about the skeleton legs, and above the crown that was set with sapphires and orange rubies, a black something swayed and nodded horribly; but, for an instant, I did not dream what it was. Then, in its middle, two oblique and scarlet eyes opened and glowed like hellish coals, and two ophidian fangs glittered in an ape-like mouth. A squat, furless, shapeless head on a neck of disproportionate extent leaned unspeakably down and whispered in the mummy's ear. Then, with one stride, the titanic lich took half the distance between us, and from out the folds of the tattered sere-cloth a gaunt arm arose, and fleshless, taloned fingers laden with glowering gems, reached out and fumbled for my throat ... |[ The Abominations of Yondo, Clark Ashton Smith, 1926 ] }} {{nethack-360}} [[Category:Monsters]] [[Category:Monster classes]] [[Category:한국어]]
